desc: Welcome to Coffee Drippz, we are a group of baristas that are passionate about coffee and the tools that we use to create a fantastic cup of coffee. We have brought together our love for coffee making and our mission to ensure our customers have the equipment to up their coffee making skills.

layout.text: We are crazy baristas with heart and soul. We know exactly which device you can use to prepare your coffee perfectly. No matter where you are: On the road, camping or in the home office. With our set, you can prepare perfect barista-quality coffee in no time. As nature lovers, we've also planted a tree for every product. Get our set for first class coffee!
